name: Logitech Lighting Effect File
summary: An EFT file is a settings file used by Logitech Gaming Software, a program used to customize Logitech G gaming mice, headsets, speakers, select wheels, and keyboards. It contains lighting effects information for a keyboard, which includes the device layout and colors. EFT files are often created by and shared with other gamers who use Logitech devices.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
